question:
Consider the following statements:
I. ELISA test is employed as the first and most basic test for an individual to detect cancer.
II. Almost 50 per cent of human beings have Rh+ blood while the remaining have Rhâ€“blood.
Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
explanation: ELISA (Enzyme-Linked Immuno Sorbent Assay) is most widely used in detecting the presence of HIV antibodies. Rh+ blood group is found in more than 85% of people.
